well, see, if it locks on, that either makes it magical or the archer 
puts some mad english on it.. so mad that as to be impossible.. and i 
would prefer to keep my archers at least not overtly magical.. or 
something..

as for orcs, i would recommend a "batter" attack, in appearance like 
a fighter's charge, but can knock down doors, trees, and the like in 
very few shots depending on factors like level, strength, 
constitution, and whatnot.

Oldschool
